alert.note: Alert for Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 7:31PM EDT until May 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Manatee County in west central Florida... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 731 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ellenton, or near Palmetto, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Bradenton, Palmetto, Holmes Beach, Anna Maria, Bradenton Beach, Ellenton, Cortez, Whitney Beach, Samoset, and South Bradenton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
